name: Kyungdon Joo
content: Researcher | Kyungdon Joo | Pennsylvania top of page This website was built on Wix. Create yours today.Get StartedNOTE: This personal website is no longer maintained. Please visit my new website here.Kyungdon Joo [CV][Google scholar]Email   kdjoo369 (at) gmail.com kyungdon (at) unist.ac.krLab webpage  rvi.unist.infoAbout meI am an assistant professor of the Artificial Intelligence Graduate School (AIGS) and the Department of Computer Science (CS) at UNIST, Korea. I was a post-doc researcher at the Robotics Institute, Carnegie Mellon University (PI: Prof. Martial Hebert and Prof. Jean Oh). I received my M.S. (Robotics program) and Ph.D. (School of Electrical Engineering) degrees at KAIST, Korea. During my graduate study, I worked at the Robotics and Computer Vision (RCV) Lab under the supervision of Prof. In So Kweon and interned at Facebook Reality Labs, Pittsburgh (Summer and Fall, 2017). I received my B.E. degree from Dept. of Electrical and Computer Engineering (ECE) at University of Seoul (UOS), Korea. ​ I am a recipient of first place ($2,000,000) in DARPA Robotics Challenge Finals (vision team member of Team KAIST), and KAIST Creativity and Challenge Award from KAIST.News!Research interests Computer vision 3D reconstruction from images (SfM, SLAM, etc.) Robotics vision Sensor fusion, vision-based ADAS, calibration Machine learning Geometry-based deep learning Jul. 2020: Two papers are accepted in ECCV 2020 Jun. 2020: One paper is accepted in IROS 2020 Jan. 2020: two papers are accepted in ICRA 2020! Sep. 2019: Joined CMU RI as a post-doc researcher Jun. 2019: One paper is accepted in IROS 2019 May 2019: One paper is accepted in RSS 2019 Apr. 2019: One paper is accepted in TPAMI bottom of page
